shortdesc.ph: Sets the format of mixed audio.

section.p: Sets the mixed audio format for the callback.

ul.li: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the samplesPerCall, sampleRate and channel parameters set in this method.Sample interval (sec) = samplePerCall/(sampleRate × channel).. Ensure that the sample interval ≥ 0.01 (s). The SDK triggers the callback according to the sampling interval.

plentry.pd: The sample rate returned in the callback, which can be set as 8000, 16000, 32000, 44100, or 48000 Hz.
The number of samples returned in the callback. Usually set as 1024 for RTMP or RTMPS streaming.
